original_title: Cow Tipping: The Militant Indian Waiter
overview: In this original short drama, a Cherokee caf√© waiter faces customers who insist on sharing their ignorance about American Indians--or are they Native Americans? His efforts to educate others often end in frustration, and a lousy tip. Based on his own experiences encountering skewed perceptions and depictions of his people, Redroad's story blends humor and rage and information. Clips from movie westerns help make his point.
title: Cow Tipping: The Militant Indian Waiter
